      public Optional<User> signIn(String login, String password) throws ServiceException
      Description copied from interface: UserService
      Searches for a User in the database with the same login and password
      Specified by:
      signIn in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      login - String representing the User's login
      password - String representing the User's password
      Returns:
      Optional.empty() if no such User was found. Otherwise, Optional of found User
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs

    • editUser

      public void editUser(Long id, String login, String name, String surname, UserRole role, boolean blocked) throws ServiceException, ValidationException
      Description copied from interface: UserService
      Inserts or updates the User in the database
      Specified by:
      editUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      id - id of User. If null, the book is inserted into the database. If not null, the Book is updated in the database
      login - login of User
      name - name of User
      surname - surname of User
      role - role of User
      blocked - blocked state of User
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs
      ValidationException - if the User is not valid
